title: Best of The Herd for Jul 21, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Jul 21, 2020
description:
The Kansas City Chiefs are getting a little ahead of themselves, LeBron James is the MVP and it isn't even close, and NFL players are getting what they want and deserve.

Guests: NFL HOF Coach Jimmy Johnson and Seattle Seahawks TE Greg Olsen

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
